Name: shed construction, large, wood, non-insulated, fire-unprotected | shed, large, wood, non-insulated, fire-unprotected | EN15804GD, U
Category: F:Construction/41:Construction of buildings/410:Construction of buildings/4100:Construction of buildings
Description: The calculation of the construction materials employed is based on Agroscope PBK+  (Modular Construction Standards for Farm Building Costs +) System (Dux 2004). Based on construction variants for model buildings, the necessary building materials for construction, repair and replacement are calculated with the aid of the PBK+ database. In addition, the consumption of energy and auxiliary materials during operation of the building can be determined.
